meanings.definition: A type of traditional Indonesian cake or dessert.
meanings.sent1: I love to bake kue for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The kue at the party was delicious.
meanings.sent3: The kue looked so good, I almost didn't want to eat it.
meanings.sent4: Her kue was a work of art, almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked kue filled the room.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Vietnam.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for kue before the trip.
meanings.sent2: The price was listed in kue at the market.
meanings.sent3: He found a forgotten stash of kue in an old drawer.
meanings.sent4: In that moment, time seemed to freeze as the kue changed hands.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together signaled the arrival of kue.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Kue is a respected member of the community.
meanings.sent2: The Kue family has a long history in the town.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten belonged to the Kue household.
meanings.sent4: The name Kue echoed through the halls of the school.
meanings.sent5: The Kue clan gathered for a reunion every year.
